Coffee

Light? Medium? or Dark?

What kind?

Dark roasts are dark brown and almost even black. The coffee will typically have a bitter and smoky or even burnt taste. The amount of caffeine however is greatly decreasd.

What kind?

Light roasts are light brown in color. They retain most of their coffeine from the coffe bean.

What kind?

Medium roats are medium brown in color. Their caffeine is somewhat decfreased but there is more caffeine than in darker roasts.
